thread.title: Singapore Dollar May Rally if Bearish USD/SGD Cue Triggered
thread.title_full: Singapore Dollar May Rally if Bearish USD/SGD Cue Triggered - WSJ

author: Ewen Chew
title: Singapore Dollar May Rally if Bearish USD/SGD Cue Triggered
text: [Dow Jones] USD/SGD may fall further, implying Singapore dollar strength versus the greenback, following the less-aggressive-than-expected policy move by the Monetary Authority of Singapore. The Singapore dollar rose as much as 0.6% after the MAS decision to slightly lower the pace of appreciation of its currency--the tool by which it manages the economy. The unexpected appreciation of the Singapore dollar in the spot market reflects that traders were expecting a more drastic policy change. Paring of long USD/SGD positions may continue to weigh on USD/SGD and thereby keep the Bollinger downtrend channel in effect. If... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
